A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie destroyed my childhood. There are so many plot holes...like the rebels are being chased by the First Order....yet Finn can go off galavating to a different world and then manage to get back to the rebel ship. The movie Is also very similar to the empire strikes back. Where Rey goes to get training from Luke....like how Luke went and got training from Yoda in Empire Strikes back. But Rey gets only like one hour of training from Luke. Luke also dies pointlessly and basically there goes the whole Skywalker legacy. The rest of the plot is simply and unrealistic. There are just so many other holes....just disgusted at what Disney has done to the franchise....they really wasted Luke as a character.
